ProductInfo.Features:
GW9732: Video-input/output : 32CH input /2CH output(BNC) Display resolution: NTSC:960×480@30fps(each Ch, Frame) Record resolution:NTSC:D1 mode-720x480(D1) 960H mode-960×480 (WD1)
GW649W:Image Sensor:1/3" Sharp CCD; Effective Pixel: NTSC: 768(H)x494(V);Sensor area:4.9mm x 3.7mm;Horizontal Resolution:600TV Lines
